HotelElement.Name: Noosa Valley Manor Luxury B&B Retreat Sunshine Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Noosa Valley Manor B&B Retreat in Doonan (Noosa), you'll be within the vicinity of Eumundi Market and Noosa Marina. This 4.5-star bed & breakfast is within the region of Cooroy Golf Club and Noosa Beach.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 4 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Kitchenettes are outfitted with refrigerators. Premium TV channels and MP3 docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. This Colonial bed & breakfast also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Noosa Valley Manor B&B Retreat, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.
